entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Explore removing resource copy into memory for .NET MAUI Blazor WebView on Windows #9206
  • [Feature Request] Add sync support to Maui SecureStorage #9204
  • KERNELBASE.dll, version: 10.0.19041.1826, 0xc000027b. Installed .msix MAUI windows APP ERROR #9203
  • Unable to install MAUI dev env workload #9202
  • Entry should use NumberBox on Windows when keyboard property is numeric #9201
  • CSS hot reload fails in .NET MAUI Blazor app after 2nd edit #9197
  • Header of the CollectionView is wider than the actual element #9194
    Backlog
  • Support building net6.0-* MAUI apps from dotnet7 SDK #9192
    7.0-rc1
  • GraphicsView renders content outside of view #9183
    Backlog
  • CSS not working in MAUI Blazor for Windows #9181

Closed

  • Flyout Navigation: Android Toolbar disappears if we close app (via Back button) and re-open it. #8266
    6.0-sr3
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Gestures does not work on elements initially outside of the view port of the ScrollView #8647
  • Android app icon not displaying #7017
    6.0-servicing
  • Entry Control in Secondary Layout Shows Text in Single Column when Keyboard Showing #9106
  • Error building maui library that invokes platform code via partial class (preview 6) #9193
  • [iOS]The "FontAttributes" property of label is not rendered on ios and maccatalyst. #7574
  • Keyboard covers the editor Still exist #9171
  • RegionInfo.CurrentRegion.ISOCurrencySymbol returns XDR on iOS device #9182
  • Gifs not working in .NET MAUI #9186
  • [Windows] Border removes child when using Line, PolyLine, Polygon as StrokeShape #7538
  • Button/ImageButton Opacity property affect full button #7124
  • Error - selected execution mode not supported in MAUI #8894
  • Build errors on OS with case-sensitive filesystem (MacOSX) #9077
  • Using `.Net Maui Community Toolkit` to change the `TintColor` at runtime. #9036
  • Aot compilation fail when publishing for iOS #8286
  • [Bug] AbsoluteLayout not going edge to edge of window #1256
    6.0-servicing
  • I have setting in drop down list in tree view doesn't show. #7286

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp from 0.8.1 to 0.9.0 #9207
  • [xamlc] fix compiled {OnPlatform} #9205
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add props file that allows us to easily isolate to a single TFM #9195
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22379.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22403.2 #9185
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp from 0.8.1 to 0.9.0 #9184
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • fix tests #8672
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixes for case-sensitive filesystems #9076
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix set the Font to Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #9124
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Convert Controls.Tests from NUnit to xUnit #9123
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Workload targets improvements (#1611) 2.0 #2011
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨
